text: All the people were amazed so that they questioned 1:27 among themselves 76.4% {TR 2%} ¦ it WH 0.2%among themselves, saying, “What is this? 1:27 What new teaching is this that with authority he … him? ¦ A new teaching with authority; he … him. CTWhat new teaching is this that with authority he commands even the unclean spirits, and they obey him?”
